text: Kishori Ballal (1937/1938 - 18 February 2020) was an Indian actress. She was known for her works in Kannada cinema. Ballal was born in Karnataka, India. Her best known works were Gair Kaanooni, Ek Alag Mausam and in Aakramana. Ballal died at a hospital in Bengaluru, India on 18 February 2020 at the age of 82.Veteran Kannada actress Kishori Ballal passes away ==References== Category:1930s births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Karnataka
title: Kishori Ballal
